kubejs.ponder.aimer.text_1: Weapon Aimer can be used to aim any placeable weaponary from Warium, including...
kubejs.ponder.aimer.text_10: For Rocket Pod it's front part
kubejs.ponder.aimer.text_7: And Armor Peeler or Fire Spear Rocket Pod
kubejs.ponder.aimer.text_8: Right-click weapon or it's main part with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach
kubejs.ponder.aimer.text_9: For rockets main part is Ordinance Core
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_1: Aimer Node creates 13x7x13 zone around it
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_10: Same logic goes for the rockets, but with Ordinance Core
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_2: Any stationary weapon from Warium in this zone will automatically connect to Aimer Node
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_3: While holding Weapon Aimer in second hand, right click Aimer Node to connect it
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_4: You can now change pitch and yaw values of all weapons in the area at the same time
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_5: And while you changing them, shooting trajectory is displayed
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_6: For Countermeasure Launcher and Smoke Launcher trajectory is not displaying for some reason
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_7: Node Trigger can shoot or activate any weaponary from Warium if located in the Aimer Node coverage area and placed next to the object
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_8: For Rocket Pod it must be placed next to the Armor Peeler Rocket Pod
kubejs.ponder.aimer_node.text_9: If Trigger placed next to the Rocket Pod Chamber it won't work
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_1: Artillery Barrel is required for Artillery Cannon to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_10: And Artillery Charge Autoloader from the side
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_11: Artillery Charge Autoloader must be facing Artillery Cannon breech to connect
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_12: Facing direction is always pointing to the side that player was standing when it was placed
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_13: Hoppers or any other modded item suppliers can be connected both to shell and charge loaders
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_14: Redstone signal is needed to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_2: Artillery Cannon shoots different types of Artillery Shells
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_3: Barrel can be extended up to 12 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_4: Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_5: Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_6: LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_7: Artillery Cannon has unique ammunition loading process...
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_8: Propellant must be loaded after the shell in order to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillery_barrel.text_9: Alternatively, Artillery Cannon Autoloader can be placed below Artillery Cannon
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_1: Artillery Cannon shoots different types of Artillery Shells
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_10: And Artillery Charge Autoloader from the side
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_11: Artillery Charge Autoloader must be facing Artillery Cannon breech to connect
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_12: Facing direction is always pointing to the side that player was standing when it was placed
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_13: Hoppers or any other modded item suppliers can be connected both to shell and charge loaders
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_14: Redstone signal is needed to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_2: Artillery Barrel is required to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_3: Barrel can be extended up to 12 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_4: Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_5: Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_6: LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_7: Artillery Cannon has unique ammunition loading process...
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_8: Propellant must be loaded after the shell in order to shoot
kubejs.ponder.artillerybreech.text_9: Alternatively, Artillery Cannon Autoloader can be placed below Artillery Cannon
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_1: Heavy Auto Cannon shoots Medium Shells
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_2: Autocannon Barrel is required to shoot
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_3: Barrel can be extended up to 6 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_4: Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_5: Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_6: LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_7: To insert shells in Heavy Auto Cannon, Autocannon Drum should be placed on top
kubejs.ponder.autocannon.text_9: Redstone signal is needed to shoot
kubejs.ponder.autocannon_barrel.text_1: Rotary Autocannon Barrel is required for 2 types of Auto Cannons
kubejs.ponder.battle_cannon_barrel.text_: Battle Cannon Barrel is required for Battle Cannon to shoot
Redstone signal is needed to shoot
Battle Cannon shoots different types of Large Shells
Barrel can be extended up to 11 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
Alternatively, Battle Cannon Autoloader can be placed below Battle Cannon
Hoppers or any other modded item suppliers can be connected to it
kubejs.ponder.battle_cannon_breech.text_: Battle Cannon shoots different types of Large Shells
Redstone signal is needed to shoot
Battle Cannon Barrel is required to shoot
Barrel can be extended up to 11 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
Alternatively, Battle Cannon Autoloader can be placed below Battle Cannon
Hoppers or any other modded item suppliers can be connected to it
kubejs.ponder.blast_funnel.text_1: Blast Funnels are used to build Alloy Furnace
kubejs.ponder.blast_funnel.text_2: 3 Blast Funnels must be ontop of the Alloy Furnace
kubejs.ponder.blast_funnel.text_6: Firebox starts working as soon as there is fuel in it
kubejs.ponder.blast_funnel.text_8: Even if Alloy Furnace is idle
kubejs.ponder.blast_funnel.text_9: There are also more efficient alternatives to Firebox...
kubejs.ponder.blast_furnace.text_1: Alloy Furnace mixes ore dusts into alloyed ingots
kubejs.ponder.blast_furnace.text_10: There are also more efficient alternatives to Firebox...
kubejs.ponder.blast_furnace.text_7: Firebox starts working as soon as there is fuel in it
kubejs.ponder.blast_furnace.text_9: Even if Alloy Furnace is idle
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_1: First step to start the reactor, is to warm it up with Uranium Fuel Rods
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_2: Put 1 Uranium Fuel Rod into each Empty Fuel Rods Section
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_3: Now that each section has consumed first rod for warmup...
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_5: Each section can hold up to 4 rods
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_6: One rod powers the reactor for 50 minutes
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_7: Once all sections have started working, enriched material can be inputted
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_8: It takes 6 minutes and 40 seconds to process 1 item
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor.text_9: Output will appear in Breeder Reactor Port
Breeder Reactor Interface is used to input items in the breeder reactor
Breeder reactor consists of 4 main parts
Chamber part consists of 3 blocks too
kubejs.ponder.breeder_reactor_port.text_: Breeder Reactor Port is used to output items from the breeder reactor
Breeder reactor consists of 4 main parts
Chamber part consists of 3 blocks too
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_1: Light Auto Cannon shoots Small Shells
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_2: Autocannon Barrel is required to shoot
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_3: Barrel can be extended up to 6 blocks long to increase shooting accuracy and distance
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_4: Weapon Aimer can be used to change shooting direction
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_5: Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_6: LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_7: To insert shells in Light Auto Cannon, Autocannon Drum should be placed on top
kubejs.ponder.light_autocannon.text_9: Redstone signal is needed to shoot
